title: version.bash reports wrong weekly tag
body:
$ hg pull
$ hg update weekly.2011-03-28
$ ./version.bash 
weekly.2011-03-15 7901
$ hg tags | grep weekly | head -n 3
weekly.2011-03-28               7901:b84e614e2516
weekly                          7901:b84e614e2516
weekly.2011-03-15               7778:3b4e9c85b643

Working on a fix.
